name: Gamagolfa
description:
Made with Unity with my partner, Gamagolfa is a school project. In this game, you control a golf ball that you must propel through the course to the final hole by using a power bar. You have a limited number of shots.

There are 4 levels that you must unlock one by one by completing the previous one. When the last level is completed, congratulations ! You have finished the game !

Controls : - Use "Q" and "D" to rotate the cameras
- Use "E" for change the angle view, and switch to SkyMode
- Use the slider for choose the power of the shot
- Press the pause button to bring up the menu

Software used : Unity ; Blender (3D modelling) ; Procreate (Drawings) ; Photoshop (UI Design) ; Substance Designer (Ice Texture) ; Visual Studio (Programming).
